game.beginning: As Xylo and Penelope meet, they realize their worlds are intertwined by a common threat.
game.ending: With the evil force defeated, they bring harmony to Zargon and Earth, forging a new era of cooperation between their planets.
game.synopsis: Follow the adventures of Xylo and Penelope as they navigate challenges and form an unlikely alliance to save their planets from an ancient enemy.
game.title: Tale of Two Planets
